name: Aniballs
description: Aniballs is a racing game where you control small animals in balls and race. You can play in local or online multiplayer with remote play against your friends! Players roll through unique 2D circuits with a side camera and can throw objects such as spears, bombs, or time stops at each other! The gameplay of Aniballs is like a fusion of Speedrunners and Mario Kart! The goal of the game is to earn the most points. You earn points by doing cool actions like hitting objects, finishing laps first, or going super fast. There are 4 adorable characters and 4 levels to unlock!
